inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has congestive heart failure with an ejection fraction of 55%

inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous diagnosis of OSA or CPAP therapy
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has congestive heart failure, obesity hypoventilation syndrome, and obstructive sleep apnea. However, they have a previous diagnosis of OSA and were exposed to CPAP therapy, which may trigger exclusion.
